text: Braden Jack Shewmake (born November 19, 1997) is an American professional baseball shortstop in the Atlanta Braves organization. He was selected by the Braves with the 21st overall pick in the 2019 Major League Baseball draft. ==Career== Shewmake attended and graduated from Wylie East High School in Wylie, Texas, where he played baseball, football, and basketball. As a senior, he hit .295 with 28 RBIs and was named to the Texas 5A All-State Baseball Team. Undrafted out of high school in the 2016 Major League Baseball draft, he enrolled at Texas A&M; University to play college baseball for the Texas A&M; Aggies. In 2017, as a freshman, Shewmake batted .328 with 11 home runs and 69 RBIs in 64 starts. He was named the SEC Freshman of the Year along with being named Collegiate Baseball's Freshman of the Year. Furthermore, he was named an All-American by multiple media outlets including Collegiate Baseball and Baseball America. Shewmake spent that summer playing for the USA Baseball Collegiate National Team. As a sophomore in 2018, Shewmake started all 61 games in which he hit .327 with five home runs, 45 RBIs, and 12 stolen bases. He was named to the All-SEC First Team for the second straight year. That summer, he returned to play for the USA Baseball Collegiate National Team. In 2019, his junior season, he batted primarily in the leadoff spot. He played in 63 games and batted .313 with six home runs, 47 RBIs, and nine stolen bases.https://247sports.com/college/texas-am/Article/Braden-Shewmake-Texas-AM- MLB-Draft-Atlanta-Braves-First-Round-132544309/ Shewmake was considered one of the top prospects for the 2019 Major League Baseball draft.http://m.mlb.com/prospects/2019?list=draft He was selected by the Atlanta Braves with the 21st overall pick.https://www.chron.com/sports/aggies/article/Texas-A-M-shortstop-Braden- Shewmake-selected-by-13927539.php He signed for $3.13 million,https://www.mlbtraderumors.com/2019/06/braves-sign-first-rounder- braden-shewmake.html and was assigned to the Rome Braves.https://www.sportstalkatl.com/braves-assign-first-round-picks-to-rome/ After slashing .318/.389/.473 with three home runs, 39 RBIs, and 11 stolen bases over 51 games with Rome, he was promoted to the Mississippi Braves in August,https://247sports.com/college/texas-am/Article/-Braden-Shewmake- Atlanta-Braves-AA-Mississippi-Braves-Minor-League-134542481/ and finished the season there. Over 14 games with Mississippi, Shewmake hit .217.https://www.baseballamerica.com/stories/braden-shewmake-exceeds- expectations-in-pro-debut/ ==References== ==External links== *Texas A&M; Aggies bio Category:1997 births Category:Living people Category:People from Wylie, Texas Category:Baseball players from Texas Category:Baseball shortstops Category:Texas A&M; Aggies baseball players Category:Rome Braves players Category:Mississippi Braves players
title: Braden Shewmake
